column1: Environment is living things and what is around them. It includes physical
column2: chemical and other natural forces. Living things do not simply exist in their environment. They constantly interact with it. Organisms change in response to conditions in their environment. In the environment there are interactions between plants
column8: and other living and non-living things. The word 'environment' is used to talk about many things. People in different fields of knowledge (like history
column9: geography or biology) use the word differently. An electromagnetic environment is the radio waves and other radiation and magnetic fields. The galactic environment refers to conditions between the stars.In psychology and medicine a person's environment is the people
column12: and events that the person lives with. The environment affects the growth and development of the person. It affects the person's behavior. It affects the person's body
